powers.name: Zettai Ryouiki (Absolute Domain)
powers.description: This ability allows the user to create an impenetrable barrier that negates all attacks below a certain power level, rendering them useless. Additionally, the user possesses a pocket dimension within the Zettai Ryouiki, granting them complete control over the environment within.

powers.name: Domain Ruler
powers.description: Allows its user to manipulate the fabric of space itself. With this power, the user can create their own pocket dimension, fully control it, move through different dimensions effortlessly, and take control of space in worlds ruled by other gods.

powers.name: Divine Focus
powers.description: Allows the user to enter a state of extreme concentration and heightened perception.

powers.name: Divine intelligence
powers.description: Allows the user to process and understand information at an incredible rate, far surpassing the capabilities of normal humans. The user can think, learn, and analyze complex problems rapidly, making connections and discovering insights impossible for others to see.

powers.name: Divine Reflect
powers.description: Grants the user the innate ability to react and respond to situations at lightning-fast speed, making it almost impossible for opponents to land a hit.

powers.name: Divine Strength
powers.description: Grants the user unparalleled physical strength, surpassing the might of most beings.

powers.name: Divine Defense
powers.description: Enhances the user's ability to withstand attacks and resist damage through divine protection.

powers.name: Divine Agility
powers.description: Bestows the user with unparalleled speed and agility, allowing swift movements and reflexes.

powers.name: Battle Instinct
powers.description: Enables the user to predict opponents' movements and quickly come up with counter-strategies. Enhances awareness to detect even the slightest change in the environment. Allows quick learning and adaptation to new fighting styles and techniques.

powers.name: Swords Master
powers.description: Mastery of the sword arts, allowing the user to wield swords with unparalleled skill and precision. The user can perform complex techniques and maneuvers effortlessly, making them a formidable combatant.
